Take Action Now

{include "default_salutation"} –

Under a proposed law, HB 4126, peaceful protesters could find themselves facing criminal charges and tougher sentencing based on the fact that they are wearing a mask.

TAKE ACTION: Tell your Oregon legislators NO on HB 4126.

Laws criminalizing face masks have concerning implications for our right to privacy and result in a chilling effect on our First Amendment rights, particularly for those who wear 'masks' for political and religious reasons.

People should be free to cover up their faces at protests or anywhere else. Tell your lawmakers to protect the right to dissent in Oregon.

Thanks for sticking with us,

ACLU of {affiliate_name}
